articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: Google's 2.4 billion euro fine upheld by Europe's top court in EU antitrust probe - CNBC
articles.description: The fine stems from an antitrust investigation by European Union regulators into Google that concluded in 2017.
articles.content:
Europe's top court on Tuesday upheld a 2.4 billion euro ($2.65 billion) fine imposed on Google for abusing its dominant position by favoring its own shopping comparison service.
CNBC has reached out… [+1738 chars]
